name: SoapMachine.exe (Covid-19) Interactive Music Video
description:
Cosmic - SoapMachine.exe (COVID-19) feat. Action Boiz

Rendered in Realtime in Unity3d | Download : SoapMachine.exe

Listen to the song live in the SoapMachine.exe where you can warp time and export your custom SoapMachine .wav at the end!
